text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Nn… I'm sorry, I was in a… meeting. 
An intellectual evil… kind of situation.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes… Last night, the beverage that 
Bakushins one's thoughts… 
Coffee, I drank too much of it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
"Stay sharp, keep that drowsiness away!"
the label said… but I didn't expect it
to go this far…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yaaaawn～… Trainer, please do be careful
around coffee.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Only one cup, and it has this effect… …
I'll… only get through half of the day
today.

Perhaps because of her overly straight-
laced nature, Sakura Bakushin O was
unable to sleep well after just one cup
of coffee…
